alerts.name: high_http_latency
alerts.description: 95th percentile latency for HTTP requests exceeds 1 second

alerts.name: http_error_spike
alerts.description: Rate of HTTP errors exceeds threshold

explanation: Alerts were created using core metrics for latency and error rate. The latency threshold at the 95th percentile helps detect performance degradation. The error rate threshold is based on sustained error spikes. Severity is assigned based on potential user impact.
llm_suggestions: Consider tuning the alert for latency based on historical baselines.
Add alert suppression logic during deployments to reduce noise.
